verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Baldad \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Suhite \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w How|strong="H0575"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w throw|strong="H7760"\w* \w out|strong="H5704"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*? \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* first, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w so|strong="H7760"\w* \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* we reputed \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* vile \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H5869"\w*?

Thou \w that|strong="H4616"\w* destroyest thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* thy fury, \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* forsaken \w for|strong="H0776"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w rocks|strong="H6697"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* removed \w out|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* their \w place|strong="H4725"\w*?

\w Shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w of|strong="H0216"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w extinguished|strong="H1846"\w*, \w and|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* \w flame|strong="H7632"\w* \w of|strong="H0216"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w shine|strong="H5050"\w*?

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* shall be \w dark|strong="H2821"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, \w and|strong="H0168"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* \w that|strong="H0216"\w* \w is|strong="H0216"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, shall be \w put|strong="H1846"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7993"\w* step \w of|strong="H6098"\w* \w his|strong="H7993"\w* \w strength|strong="H0202"\w* shall be straitened, \w and|strong="H6098"\w* \w his|strong="H7993"\w* own \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* shall \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w him|strong="H7993"\w* \w down|strong="H7993"\w* headlong.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w thrust|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w net|strong="H7568"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* walketh \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* meshes.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* sole \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* foot shall be \w held|strong="H0270"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w snare|strong="H6341"\w*, \w and|strong="H2388"\w* thirst shall burn \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w A|strong="H5921"\w* gin \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w hidden|strong="H2934"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w trap|strong="H4434"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w path|strong="H5410"\w*.

Fears shall \w terrify|strong="H1204"\w* \w him|strong="H5439"\w* \w on|strong="H7272"\w* \w every|strong="H5439"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w*, \w and|strong="H7272"\w* shall entangle \w his|strong="H5439"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w strength|strong="H0202"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* wasted \w with|strong="H1961"\w* famine, \w and|strong="H1961"\w* \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w hunger|strong="H7457"\w* invade \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w ribs|strong="H6763"\w*.

Let \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* beauty \w of|strong="H1060"\w* \w his|strong="H0398"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w*, let \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w consume|strong="H0398"\w* \w his|strong="H0398"\w* arms.

Let \w his|strong="H4428"\w* \w confidence|strong="H4009"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* rooted out \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H4428"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* let destruction tread upon \w him|strong="H4428"\w* \w like|strong="H5423"\w* \w a|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

Let \w the|strong="H5921"\w* companions \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1097"\w* \w is|strong="H0168"\w* \w not|strong="H0168"\w*, \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, let \w brimstone|strong="H1614"\w* be sprinkled \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*.

Let \w his|strong="H8478"\w* \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* be \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w beneath|strong="H8478"\w*, \w and|strong="H4605"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* destroyed \w above|strong="H4605"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w memory|strong="H2143"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w renowned|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w*.

\w He|strong="H2822"\w* shall drive \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H0216"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w and|strong="H2822"\w* shall remove \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H0216"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w world|strong="H8398"\w*.

\w His|strong="H3808"\w* seed \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* subsist, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w offspring|strong="H5209"\w* \w among|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H0369"\w* remnants \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* country.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0314"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w horror|strong="H8074"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* fall \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* went \w before|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w men|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* tabernacles \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* wicked, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* knoweth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.
